snippet.name: Title
snippet.help: Returns the value of the TITLE attribute defined by the <TITLE> HTML tag in any HTML or ColdFusion template file that was indexed by CFINDEX. If the collection was TYPE=CUSTOM, TITLE returns the value of the TITLE attribute defined by the CFINDEX tag. If the collection was TYPE=FILE, TITLE also returns the value of the TITLE attribute defined by the CFINDEX tag
